title: Customizable Prizing Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the Quick Pick game
AND taps the hamburger menu

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is displayed with 

* Title 'Leaderboard'
* X icon on the top right corner
* Beat the Streak logo
* sponsor logo
* token icon + amount (10)
* legal copy: 'No Purchase Necessary. 21+. Ends at conclusion of MLB regular season or when Grand Prize is won. Restrictions apply; Official Rules.'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on the Official Rules
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the mlb.com Beat the Streak 2022 Official Rules page in a webview

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on the X icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User should be taken back to the gameloop

title: Leaderboard segment controller
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the Quick Pick game
AND taps the hamburger menu
custom_expected: Leaderboards should be able to filter between the Friends /All time leaderboard.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with
* Friends and All leaderboards
AND both leaderboards should have 3 subsegments
* Current Streak
* All Season
* All Time

THEN the leaderboard should always defaulted to Friends -> Weekly
AND selected leaderboard should have a blue underline
AND user should be able to switch between All and Friends segment
AND user should be presented with the total number of users to the right of the leaderboard name in the segment controller

title: 'You' cell
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the Quick Pick game
AND taps the hamburger menu
AND opens the Leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user first opens the leaderboard 
AND the user is in the first set of visible ranks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the default view shows the top of the leaderboard (starting with position 1) AND the user’s position is highlighted light grey

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is scrolled to a position that is less than the user’s current position
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the 'you' cell sticks at the bottom of the leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the 'you' cell
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is taken to their position in the leaderboard and the position is centered on the page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user scrolls to the user’s position in the leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the 'you' cell will slot into the correct position

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is scrolled to a position that is greater than the user’s current position
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the 'you' cell sticks at the top of the leaderboard

title: Leaderboard Empty States UI - user has no friends
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the Quick Pick game
AND taps the hamburger menu 
AND user selects Leaderboard
custom_expected: THEN User should display with empty State version of the page instead of blank page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Friends segment
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 0 should be displayed to the right of 'Freidns'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the empty Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with- 

* leaderboard image
* copy 'There aren't any scores to display. 
Invite some friends to play! '
* Invite Friends CTA

title: Social Leaderboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user opens the Quick Pick game
AND taps the hamburger menu 
AND user selects Leaderboard - Friends

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN no friends or self playing
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN friends are displayed in the leaderboard in inactive state 
AND friends cell is grayed out and no scores are displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Self playing, no friends playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Self is displayed in the leaderboard with the current score

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Friends and self playing.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Friends and self are displayed in the leaderboard with the current score

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Friends playing and no self playing.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN only friends are displayed in the leaderboard, no self
